ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic prosthetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Understanding the shape of a leg and combining that knowledge with basic woodworking, you can now craft peg legs and other basic prostheses.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Simple prosthetics workbench
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advanced anatomy studies and metal testing will allow you to build simple prostheses.

ResearchProjectDef.label: bionics workbench
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discovering the concept of very small motors and circuits, new possibilities of better prostheses are now open for you.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Upgrade regular bionics to make them even better. Unlocks new recipes on the bionics workbench.

ResearchProjectDef.label: rib replacements
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discovering the concept of very small dispensers, you think about putting them in ribs. You can now craft and install rib implants.

ResearchProjectDef.label: tissue printer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Gaining higher medical and technical knowledge, creating a 3D printer to craft simple surrogate organs becomes possible.

ResearchProjectDef.label: synthetic organs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further research in nano-technology allows you to print incredibly well-engineered artificial organs. Unlocks new recipes on the tissue printer.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Synthetic repair
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further research in nano-technology allows you to print incredibly well-engineered artificial tissues and nerves to aid with healing scars, frailty and bad backs. Unlocks synthetic tissue and neuromuscular framework recipes on the tissue printer.

ResearchProjectDef.label: brain surgery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to perform surgery on the brain.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Glitterworld implants
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to make Glitterworld implants.

ResearchProjectDef.label: AI persona core implant
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to perform the surgery to implant an AI persona core into the brain. It provides a powerful consciousness boost with the assistance of the AI, but it will require regular medical maintenance to avoid the AI turning rogue on the user.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Organic optimization
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to develop nanobots to optimize and bring out the full potential of the natural body. Body purists are fine or even happy with some of this, whilst transhumanists hates all of this.

ResearchProjectDef.label: MA-AI chip
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to manufacture your own MA-AI chip (Medical Assistant-AI chip), without needing to find and use up a AI persona core when using the lower tech method.
